data.title: Takahito and Yuriko, Prince and Princess Mikasa
data.meta_description: Sold for $0 | Members of the Imperial House of Japan, Takahito (1915-2016) was the youngest son of Emperor Taisho and brother of Hitohito; his widow Yuriko
data.text:
Description

Members of the Imperial House of Japan, Takahito (1915-2016) was the youngest son of Emperor Taisho and brother of Hitohito; his widow Yuriko (born 1923) is the oldest living member of the Imperial Family. Vintage fountain pen signatures in Japanese and English, "Takahito" and "Yuriko," on individual off-white 5.25 x 3.25 cards. In very fine condition. Accompanied by the original mailing envelope, postmarked July 9, 1958.

Auction Info

Auction Title: Fine Autographs and Artifacts

Dates: #560 - Ended July 10, 2019

This item is Pre-Certified by PSA/DNA
